pages.text: This book was written as an introduction to modded for the $(l)Enigmatica$(reset) family of packs.$(br)$(l)Credits to:$(reset)$(br)-$(l)Merlo$(reset): book author$(br)-$(l)Frikkle$(reset): author of the Bugs and Troubleshooting chapter (that's still missing because he's lazy)$(br)-$(l)Ridanisaurus$(reset): pixel artist and all around great guy$(br)-$(l)NillerMedDild$(reset): founder and author of the Enigmatica packs$(br)
